term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - core atom in organic reaction mechanisms
term.title: core atom

item.text: The primary reference atom in a mechanistic change; usually either of the two atoms of a transformed multiple bond or the single atom at which substitution occurs.

sources.item: PAC, 1989, 61, 23. 'System for symbolic representation of reaction mechanisms (Recommendations 1988)' on page 55 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198961010023)
